name: 7 and 7
description:
Match identical blocks to reduce them from 7 to zero and eventually clear them from the stage. Don't get crushed.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Spacebar - Jump (You can double jump)

Shift/E - Pickup & Place Blocks

R - Restart

Difficulty increases upon reaching 5, 15, 30, and 50 points.

My submission for Godot Wild Jam #32 with the theme of "Seven" and the wildcard "Good things come to those who wait"

Art and Code by me. Music is by OMFGDude.
